author: joes
msg: Opera may include a charset attribute in its Content-Type header.  I dropped nextval() from apreq_parsers.c and replaced it with apreq_header_attribute() in apreq.h.  Updated the mfd parser test in t/parsers.c accordingly.

author: randyk
msg: add some long query and big post tests for the libapreq_cgi tests.

author: stas
msg: fix the config parser to support <Foo>..</Foo> containers (no
arguments in the opening tag) supported by httpd 1.3. Without
this change mod_perl 2.0's <Perl> sections are broken.
